entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
